_meanings:
To cause 

to smell; <ls>Bk. 15. 109.</ls> (Prepositions
like {#ava, A, upa, vi, saM#} &c. are added
to this root without any material
change of meaning; {#gaMDamAGrAya corvyAH#}
<ls>Me. 21</ls>; {#AmodamupajiGraMtO#} <ls>R. 1. 43</ls>; see
<ls>Bk. 2. 10</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">14. 12</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 3</ls>; <ls n="R.">13. 70</ls>;
<ls>Ms. 4. 209</ls> also).
